In the 5th post of the [Scientist's Guide to R series](https://craig.rbind.io/post/2019-05-17-asgr-basic-workflow/) we explore using the [tidyr](https://tidyr.tidyverse.org/) package to reshape data. You'll learn all about splitting and combining columns and how to do wide to long or long to wide transformations. Click [here](https://craig.rbind.io/post/2020-01-25-asgr-2-1-data-transformation-part-2/) for the full post.
